section.title: GeoClue Layer
section.para: Enable following and/or creating a track from the position returned by the GeoClue service.

note.para: GeoClue runs using dbus messaging service. This is currently disabled in the Windows build of &appname; due to system distribution complexities.

listitem.para: Recording tracks - Whether to form a track on the location updates.
Jump to the position on start.
Moving method - How the viewport is moved upon location updates: centered, keep the position in the viewport or none.
Update Statusbar - Whether the Statusbar is also updated on location updates

section.title: Start / Stop Tracking
section.para: Offers manual control over the start or stop tracking as appropriate.

section.title: Empty
section.para: Quick access to remove all data from the tracking layer.
